Body:
I want to send data from an arduino to a web page for remote monitoring as well as send data from the web page to arduino for remote control. Is it possible to create both a client and a server in the same Arduino? Also is there any method by which it is possible to control and monitor an Arduino at the same time?

Thanks
Yes, it is possible to have both a client and a server in the Arduino running at the same time. Your second question is not very clear.

For the second qn, I want to use arduino as a web client, but I should be able to monitor and control the arduino using GET/POST requests. For eg. analog values from a sensor connected to Arduino should be visible on a web page hosted by the web server, at the same time can I use it to obtain data from the webserver for eg. to control an LED connected to the arduino using a switch on that web page? Is there an example available? @Alphonsos_Pangas
